TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ComboBoxRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用來呈現具有視覺化樣式之下拉式方塊控制項的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used to render a combo box control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供一組`static`可以用來呈現下拉式方塊控制項，與目前作業系統的視覺化樣式的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a combo box control with the current visual style of the operating system. 呈現控制項是指繪製控制項的使用者介面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 這非常有用，如果要繪製的自訂控制項，應該具有目前的視覺化樣式外觀。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style. 若要繪製下拉式方塊，請使用方法，以畫出文字方塊和方法繪製下拉箭號。To draw a combo box, use the method to draw the text box and the method to draw the drop-down arrow. 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至應用程式視窗的用戶端區域和時，會繪製下拉式方塊與目前的視覺化樣式。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, and will draw the combo box with the current visual style. 否則，這些方法會擲回。Otherwise, these methods will throw an . 若要判斷是否可以使用這個類別的成員，您可以檢查的值屬性。To determine whether the members of this class can be used, you can check the value of the property. 這個類別會包裝的功能設定為其中一個項目所公開和類別。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the and classes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[視覺化樣式呈現控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立使用的自訂控制項和方法來繪製滑鼠點選回應的下拉式方塊。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the and methods to draw a combo box that responds to mouse clicks. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

Public Shared Sub DrawDropDownButton (g As Graphics, bounds As Rectangle, state As ComboBoxState)

param.name: state
param.span: 其中一個 值，指定下拉箭號的可見狀態。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the visual state of the drop-down arrow.

summary.span: 繪製具有作業系統之目前視覺化樣式的下拉箭號。

span.span: Draws a drop-down arrow with the current visual style of the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前呼叫這個方法，您應該確認屬性會傳回`true`。Before calling this method, you should verify that the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用中自訂控制項的方法方法，取決於滑鼠指標位置的狀態繪製下拉箭號。The following code example uses the method in a custom control's method to draw a drop-down arrow in the state determined by the location of the mouse pointer. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#4)]

exception.span: 作業系統不支援視覺化樣式。

span.span: The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or-

exception.span: 使用者已停用作業系統中的視覺化樣式。

span.span: Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-

exception.span: 視覺化樣式不適用於應用程式視窗的工作區。

span.span: Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

summary.span: 繪製具有作業系統之目前視覺化樣式的文字方塊。

span.span: Draws a text box with the current visual style of the operating system.

.property bool IsSupported
Public Shared ReadOnly Property IsSupported As Boolean

summary.span: 取得值，指出 類別是否可用來繪製具有視覺化樣式的下拉式方塊。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the class can be used to draw a combo box with visual styles.

value.span: 如果使用者在作業系統中已經啟用視覺化樣式，而且應用程式視窗的工作區中已經套用視覺化樣式，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the user has enabled visual styles in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性是`false`、或方法會擲回。If this property is `false`, the or methods will throw an . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性來判斷是否要使用方法。The following code example uses the property to determine whether to use the methods. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
